name: map-transform
description: Apply field extraction or transformation to each element in an array

input.description: Object containing an array at the specified path

array_path.description: Dot-separated path to the array field (defaults to 'items')

field.description: Field name to extract from each array element (defaults to '.' for identity)

operation.description: Optional operation to apply: multiply, add, subtract, divide, uppercase, lowercase, tostring, tonumber

operand.description: Operand for arithmetic operations (required for multiply, add, subtract, divide)

output.description: Object with array elements transformed according to the specified operation
